org.cougaar.tools.robustness.sensors
Class PingRequest

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.cougaar.tools.robustness.sensors.PingRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.cougaar.core.util.UniqueObject
public class PingRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.cougaar.core.util.UniqueObject

A Plugin developer requests a ping by publishing a PingRequest on the blackboard of a local agent with PingRequesterPlugin loaded.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Summary
static int FAILED
          A PingRequest for which a Ping has not been echoed before timing out or failing in some other way.
static int NEW
          A new PingRequest that has not yet resulted in a Ping being sent by PingRequesterPlugin to target Agent.
static int RECEIVED
          A PingRequest for which a Ping has been echoed by PingServerPlugin in target Agent.
static int SENT
          A PingRequest that has resulted in a Ping being sent by PingRequesterPlugin to target Agent.
